name: Alex Johnson
title: Senior Front End Developer | UI Engineer
profile: Experienced front-end developer with 12+ years of expertise building scalable web applications for tech startups and mid-size companies. Passionate about creating intuitive user experiences and implementing modern development practices. Strong background in component-based architectures and responsive design patterns.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer (Remote)
experience.summary: Lead frontend development for enterprise SaaS platform serving 10,000+ users.
accomplishments: Migrated legacy React application to Angular 18, improving performance by 40%.
Implemented micro-frontend architecture reducing deployment complexity.
Built comprehensive component library used across 5 different applications.

experience.title: UI Developer (Hybrid)
experience.summary: Developed data visualization dashboards for Fortune 500 analytics platform.
accomplishments: Created interactive chart components using D3.js and Angular, handling datasets with 100k+ records.
Optimized rendering performance for real-time data updates using OnPush change detection.
Collaborated with UX team to implement accessibility standards achieving WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
Mentored 3 junior developers on Angular best practices and testing strategies.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
experience.summary: Built responsive web applications for cloud storage and file synchronization platform.
accomplishments: Developed file management interface handling drag-and-drop uploads with progress tracking.
Implemented PWA features including offline support and background sync capabilities.
Reduced bundle size by 30% through code splitting and lazy loading optimization.
Established automated testing pipeline with 85% code coverage using Karma and Jasmine.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: Full-stack development for early-stage startup building project management tools.
accomplishments: Built MVP using Angular and Node.js serving 500+ beta users within 6 months.
Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSocket connections.
Designed responsive UI components supporting mobile-first development approach.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
accomplishments: Developed marketing websites for 20+ clients using HTML, CSS, and jQuery.
Implemented Google Analytics tracking and conversion optimization features.

experience.title: Frontend Intern
accomplishments: Created responsive email templates achieving 95% cross-client compatibility.
Assisted in WordPress theme development and customization projects.
